title: SmallRye Reactive Messaging RabbitMQ cannot find queue.name
body:
### Describe the bug

The issue occur: The attribute `queue.name` on connector 'smallrye-rabbitmq' (channel: events) must be set

The log from application:
```
2021-12-20 11:53:36,431 ERROR [io.qua.dep.dev.IsolatedDevModeMain] (main) Failed to start quarkus: java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.RuntimeException: Failed to start quarkus

```

### Expected behavior

Set `mp.messaging.incoming.events.queue.name: events` in `application.yml` and application run normally.

### Actual behavior

Set `mp.messaging.incoming.events.queue.name: events` in `application.yml` and application did not run.

### How to Reproduce?

application.yml

```yaml
mp.messaging.incoming.events.connector: smallrye-rabbitmq
mp.messaging.incoming.events.queue.name: events
mp.messaging.incoming.events.durable: false

"%dev":
  rabbitmq-host: vulture.rmq.cloudamqp.com
  rabbitmq-port: 5671
  rabbitmq-username:
  rabbitmq-password:
  rabbitmq-virtual-host:
  rabbitmq-ssl: true
  ```

build.gradle

```yaml
dependencies {
    implementation enforcedPlatform("${quarkusPlatformGroupId}:${quarkusPlatformArtifactId}:${quarkusPlatformVersion}")
    implementation 'io.quarkus:quarkus-mutiny'
    implementation 'io.quarkus:quarkus-smallrye-reactive-messaging-rabbitmq'
    implementation 'io.quarkus:quarkus-config-yaml'
    implementation 'io.quarkus:quarkus-smallrye-health'
    implementation 'io.quarkus:quarkus-kubernetes'
    implementation 'io.quarkus:quarkus-cache'
    implementation 'io.quarkus:quarkus-container-image-jib'
    implementation 'io.quarkus:quarkus-arc'
    testImplementation 'io.quarkus:quarkus-junit5'
}

```

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin Spys-iMac-Pro.local 20.6.0 Darwin Kernel Version 20.6.0: Mon Aug 30 06:12:21 PDT 2021; root:xnu-7195.141.6~3/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk 11.0.11 2021-04-20 OpenJDK Runtime Environment AdoptOpenJDK-11.0.11+9 (build 11.0.11+9) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM AdoptOpenJDK-11.0.11+9 (build 11.0.11+9, mixed mode)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.5.3.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Gradle 7.1.1

### Additional information

_No response_
